summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Prima Styling Iron can straighten or curl. This one tool creates smoother, shinier, more beautiful results.
details: DetailsFeaturesPrima 3100 - 1'' Stainless steel housingFloating titanium platesIon Mulitplier TechnologyDual ceramic heating systemHigh temperatures of 465 FLimited 4 year manufacturer warrantyDual VoltageBenefitsThe titanium plates of this flat iron heat up instantly and hold a consistent temperature while millions of ions deliver shiny, smooth hair.Perfect for all hair types, use the Prima 3000 to straighten and smooth OR to create loose beachy waves with maximum easeHigh temperatures enables styling of the most resistant hair typesItem 2501003

reviews.headline: Re bought!
reviews.comments: I have bought this straighter TWICE. The first one I had for about 5 years and it finally stopped heating up. I re bought it because I love it so much. I straighten my hair and curl it. I recommended it to my friend as well for her daughter because she loved the way I would style my hair. Her daughter is obsessed with it as well. However, I would NEVER recommend putting it on the highest setting. Place it on the middle setting for best results.

reviews.headline: This is the One.
reviews.comments: Buy it.

reviews.headline: DOESNT automatically turn off  :(
reviews.comments: needs to turn off automatically at some point.

reviews.headline: Never again!!
reviews.comments: I bought me this straightener thinking it was going to be good due to the reviews and price. It stopped working after 5 weeks of purchase. So sad :(

reviews.headline: Save your money
reviews.comments: Stops working after a month or two

reviews.headline: if i could give zero!
reviews.comments: i have course hair so i need my straight iron to be on a high temperature bad idea. i've burned myself so many times that its crazy. i cant even return it. i recommend the Babyliss nano titanium ultra flat iron. if your in need of an iron thats what i should have stuck with. i wish ulta would would do a exchange with that one.

reviews.headline: Worth The Price!
reviews.comments: Love this flat iron! Makes my hair look sleek and shiny! I don't have to do multiple passes. Beautiful design, it looks high quality. Haven't had it long so I can't speak to longevity. Best flat iron I had used so far!

reviews.headline: 4B/C Fine Natural Hair
reviews.comments: I was looking for a flat iron that I could use safely after a workout. My hair stylist uses this on my hair so I decided to purchase one for at home use. This styling iron made my 4c hair straight with a single pass and last without swelling for  days. I absolutely love my hair. So much less maintenance.

reviews.headline: Waste of money
reviews.comments: Don't waste your money. I bought this flat iron less than a year ago, and it stopped working. I definitely wouldn't recommend this product.

reviews.headline: poor quality
reviews.comments: I've only had this a little over 3 months and the coating on the plates has bubbled up on the surface and peeled on the edges. This was an expensive straightener so I'm super disappointed. I won't be buying this brand again.

reviews.headline: If you have to use your hands, the tips burn your fingers
reviews.comments: The design is not well thought out if you can't make the curl one handed the tips will burn your fingers. The rubber is on the tips, but there is a line of metal exposed on the outerrim.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: BOMB 10/10 RECOMMEND! I have very curly/thick hair and after one pass with the chase method, I was surprised at how straight it was. I'm so glad I purchased this!

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: This straightener works really great for me. I used it both for straightening and curling and it does both beautifully! I get better curls than with the traditional CHI straightener that I had before this. I also appreciate the various heat settings and I've had no issues with damage to my hair.

reviews.headline: Not impressed
reviews.comments: Snags hair, locks unintentionally, takes several passes

reviews.headline: It doesn't even deserve 1 start. After 6 months is dead.
reviews.comments: I bought this expensive product that I used once. After 6 months is dead. I came to the store ULTA for guarantee of course they said no. Do not purchase this product you will waste your money.

reviews.headline: Lasted less than a year
reviews.comments: I purchased this hair straightener less than a year ago. Up until this last week, I loved it. It heated up quick and smoothed my hair quickly. However, for the price I paid I am so disappointed that it didn't last. I cannot return to Ulta, and Babyliss won't exchange it either. For the price I paid this straightener should last for many years.

reviews.headline: DONT GET IF….
reviews.comments: do not get this produduct… if you have curly hair . You may think you wont care about the damage but you will the technology in here is not meant for the everday oerson its meant for professionals it made my hair super dry no procts could fix it until i stopped using it. if you want a babyliss flat iron get a CERAMIC if wont damage and dry your hair. i reccomment fhi flat iron THE BEST I EVER USED NOT THIS ONE

reviews.headline: DONT GET IF….
reviews.comments: do not get this produduct… if you have curly hair . You may think you wont care about the damage but you will the technology in here is not meant for the everday oerson its meant for professionals it made my hair super dry no procts could fix it until i stopped using it. if you want a babyliss flat iron get a CERAMIC if wont damage and dry your hair. i reccomment fhi flat iron THE BEST I EVER USED NOT THIS ONE

reviews.headline: Review From a Hairstylist
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love the Babyliss Nano Titanium range! This flat iron heats up quickly, making it perfect for anyone in a hurry to style their hair before going out or for those with back-to-back clients. It truly delivers!

After styling my clients' hair, I'm almost always asked which flat iron I'm using. Whether I'm straightening, curling, or creating waves, the results are frizz-free and long-lasting.

However, I do have two drawbacks to mention. First, the price point is a bit high, especially if you don't plan to use it consistently. Second, the plates on the outside get very hot! When I first used my loaned Nano, no one mentioned this detail, and I burned my fingers a few times. 

The heated plates are a great feature, as long as you remember they're there.

Overall, I'm very pleased with my Babyliss!

reviews.headline: Expensive for what it is
reviews.comments: It does work nicely to straighten my hair but I cannot get it to curl my hair whereas I could with my other straightener so I wouldn't say it's user error lol so just for a straightener I would say it's overpriced overhyped

media.headline: SO GOOD! Great for course THICK hair!

faceoff_positive.comments:
This will give you a SILK PRESS finnish in no time!! I love it! Its heavy but performs effortlessly without hand aches from squeezing. I barley have to do anything. IT HAS A LOCK SWITCH!
I have long, think, curly, strong, course biracial hair (Like the movie Brave) and this iron straightens it in 1 pass. I use Redken Diamomd oil and Alterna heat spray (blue bottle not Bamboo) for heat protectant as well. 
This iron is HEAVY DUTY, built to last and feels very PRO. 
VERY long cord.
wide plates that are rounded on the edge, so it makes tight curls, beautifully, for my pinup style. 
Ladies... I never leave reviews but this thing has seriously changed me. I would dread washing my hair knowing that i had to flat iron afterward. Thia makes me happy to do my hair ans cut the time by half.

Best money ive spent at ULTA
faceoff_positive.headline: SO GOOD! Great for course THICK hair!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this and used it with no issues for 6 months. Then last week it FRIED my hair. My long hair is DONE and still, after washing, smells burnt. Then when I went to turn it back on to try it on a lower setting, it wouldn't heat up. I think the heating coil got overly hot the last time I did my hair, fried it, then burned itself out.
faceoff_negative.headline: DO NOT BUY
